name: reconstruct: mask
description:
2000 x 2000 original audiovisual

reassembling another layer of a self, reclaiming a lopsided sacrifice and to humanise again, whatever that means

as far as humans are concerned, however, "the real is impossible," as lacan was fond of saying

hence, with this mask on, as long as it remains untouched, pronounced as om, the name’s oauhm, hi.

_______________________________

“but there is no such substratum; there is no "being" behind doing, effecting, becoming; "the doer" is merely a fiction added to the deed-the deed is everything”

“but a spirit who is sure of himself speaks softly; he seeks secrecy, he lets himself be awaited”

― friedrich nietzsche, on the genealogy of morals
